Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This item is not just a product; it's an experience that promises to exceed your expectations. Considering its unique features and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For this extraordinary offering, I am extending a special invitation to you with an exclusive price of $100. It's an opportunity to own something truly special at a competitive price. I trust you'll appreciate its value and make the most of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
